name: Knight's Quest (Wolfina5)
description:
Fight onslaughts of enemies in this metroidvania style adventure. Take the role of Trevor as you fight your way to some cold hard cash.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump and progress cutscenes
  • J to attack
  • K for shield to defend.
